document_data.caption: Map showing the Goblintide and environs.
document_data.name: Goblintide River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Goblintide River''', also known as '''Gaurlynlur''' to the [[dwarves]], traveled through the eastern [[Lurkwood]] where it joined with [[Shining Creek]] before emptying into the [[River Surbrin]]. The matriarchal Urlbluk tribe of [[kobold]]s lived near the Goblintide's headwaters.{{Cite dragon/216/Elminster's Notebook: Kobold commotions|100}}
